hibernate-mapping.query: select disciplinaryCode from omis.disciplinaryCode.domain.DisciplinaryCode disciplinaryCode where disciplinaryCode.value = :value
select disciplinaryCode from omis.disciplinaryCode.domain.DisciplinaryCode disciplinaryCode where disciplinaryCode.value = :value and disciplinaryCode != :disciplinaryCode
select disciplinaryCode from omis.disciplinaryCode.domain.DisciplinaryCode disciplinaryCode where upper(disciplinaryCode.value) like '%' || upper(:value) || '%'

select disciplinaryCode from omis.disciplinaryCode.domain.SupervisoryOrganizationCode supervisoryOrganizationCode inner join supervisoryOrganizationCode.code disciplinaryCode where supervisoryOrganizationCode.supervisoryOrganization = :supervisoryOrganization and (supervisoryOrganizationCode.dateRange.startDate <= :effectiveDate) and (supervisoryOrganizationCode.dateRange.endDate > :effectiveDate or supervisoryOrganizationCode.dateRange.endDate is null)
